message: After the awesome Solarized color scheme, here is another one: https://github.com/ChrisKempson/Tomorrow-Theme
Nice. Including the hex palettes is a very nice touch; I'll be giving this a spin for a few days ;-).
For those using janus, add these lines to your ~/.janus.rake:

vim_plugin_task "tomorrow-theme" do
  %w{Tomorrow-Night-Blue Tomorrow-Night-Eighties Tomorrow-Night Tomorrow}.each do |item|
    sh "curl https://raw.github.com/ChrisKempson/Tomorrow-Theme/master/Vim/#{item}.vim > colors/#{item.downcase}.vim"
  end 
end
For some reason, the colors in iTerm2 are really dark for me, or colors like red and blue look really dark in my terminals. Any idea what might be causing this?
